page.title: 14Personality 3 (Retired Lady)
page.content: Margaret Sutherland is a retired lady living in Stenness.Everybody calls her 'Peggy'.She was born in Flotta one of the South Isles of Orkney.She and her family came to Stenness in 1967 because the population was falling and there were no jobs.She has two brothers and five sisters.When the family came to the Mainland (the main island)they bought a garage and a small shop where she worked for 16 years.She had a busy life selling petrol and groceries and during the day she met lots of people.Now she is retired and lives on her own in a small bungalow 200m. from the shop.She spends a lot of time gardening and has a greenhouse. She misses all the company she had when she worked.She is able sometimes to go on holidays.
